briefTitle: The Prognostic Value of FDG PET/CT and Diffusion-weighed Imaging on Breast Cancer
officialTitle: The Prognostic Value of FDG PET/CT and Diffusion-weighed Imaging on Detection of Primary Tumor and Axillary Metastasis for Breast Cancer: SUVMax Against to ADC
primaryOutcomeMeasure: To evaluate the relationships between both SUVmax and ADC and clinicopathological prognostic factors
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Newly diagnosis of breast cancer for which surgical intervention is planned

Exclusion Criteria:

* patients received neoadjuvant chemotherapy
* before breast surgery
